title: Incident - Conference Room AV Issue
description: A user reports they are unable to get the presentation to show on the main screen in a conference room.

tasks.description: Ask the user to verify all cables are securely plugged in and the projector/TV is on the correct input source.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user confirms all basic connections are correct.

tasks.description: Guide the user to check their laptop's display settings (e.g., press Windows Key + P) and select 'Duplicate' or 'Extend'.
tasks.expected_outcome: This action resolves the issue, and the presentation appears on the screen.
